MicroWeb DOS web browser – for 8088 systems

stories.text:
We built a Chrome extension that pays out Crypto for browsing the Internet paid by advertisers for data access to eliminate the data aggregator middlemen.

The system compiles an anonymous profile of browsing history and sells the data to media buyers interested in behaviorally targeted ads.
stories.title: ShowHN: "Get Paid to Browse" Chrome Extension

stories.text: Usually there's a lot of interesting summaries of the year from personal blogs of various people but I haven't seen many on the front page this week.
